communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All data collected by the Mill Valley Police Department pursuant to the California Racial and Identity Profiling Act (RIPA) from April 1, 2023 through August 31, 2023. Please provide the raw data in spreadsheet form without modification by the Department or any of its vendors, including all categories of data that the Department provides to the California Department of Justice in accordance with RIPA.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tammy Edmonson

title: Appalachian Regional Clean Hydrogen Hub (ARCH2) proposal

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Appalachian Regional Clean Hydrogen Hub (ARCH2) proposal
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Applications and correspondence between officials at the Department of Energy (DOE), the consortium named the Appalachian Regional Clean Hydrogen Hub, and the "project development partners"  of the Appalachian Regional Clean Hydrogen Hub project (ARCH2) .

The ARCH2 project is one of seven sites selected by the DOE as a "clean hydrogen" hub, announced Oct. 13, 2023. "Following a Request for Information in Spring 2022 to solicit public input, DOE solicited applications for H2Hubs with a Funding Opportunity Announcement (FOA) in September 2022, and conducted merit reviews of eligible project submissions in 2023."

https://www.energy.gov/oced/regional-clean-hydrogen-hubs-selections-award-negotiations

The ARCH2 consortium includes the project development partners as follows: 

https://www.arch2hub.com/pdps/

1. Air Liquide
2. Clearway
3. CNX Resources
4. Dominion Energy
5. Empire Diversified Energy
6. EQT
7. Fidelis New Energy
8. Hog Lick Aggregates
9. Hope Gas
10. Independence Hydrogen
11. KeyState Energy
12. Marathon Petroleum
13. Plug Power
14. TC Energy 
15. Chemours

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

David Moore
